summary: The lives of Edith Bouvier Beale and her daughter Edith, aunt and cousin of Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis.
cast: Drew Barrymore|Jessica Lange|Jeanne Tripplehorn|Ken Howard|Kenneth Welsh|Arye Gross|Louis Ferreira|Daniel Baldwin|Malcolm Gets|Louis Grise|Joshua Peace|Neil Babcock|Ben Carlson|Olivia Waldriff|Neil Girvan|Timm Zemanek|Arnold Pinnock|Perry Mucci|Lorna Wilson|Marcia Bennett|Evan Williams|Tamsen McDonough|Kevin Etherington|Sophie Goulet|Dave Kiner|Duane Murray|Catherine Marie Thomas
title: Grey Gardens
